name: Processor/CPU
description: This is a Processor that is the brain of the PC.

name: Motherboard/MB
description: This is a motherboard, this goes into the case.

name: Memory Module/RAM
description: This is the RAM, that goes into the MB on the right side next to the CPU.

name: Graphic Card/GPU
description: This is the GPU, this sends video to the monitor and also an important part of the pc.

name: Solid State Drive/SSD
description: This is the storage where all the programs and operation system is located.

name: Power Supply/PSU
description: This is the PSU that gives power to the components.

name: Case
description: This is the case, where all the components go in and then kaboom its a PC

name: Processor Cooler/CPU Cooler
description: This cools down the processor. It can be liquid or air cooler.
